response:
Left-sided spastic hemiparesis with hyperreflexia and an extensor plantar response, together with ipsilateral (right) lower motor neuron facial weakness involving upper and lower face, gait unsteadiness, and gaze-evoked nystagmus indicate a crossed brainstem syndrome localising to the right caudal pons where corticospinal fibres, facial nucleus/fascicle, and vestibulo-cerebellar pathways lie close together; the separate unilateral optic neuropathy (reduced left visual acuity and RAPD) localises to the left optic nerve.

lesion_locations = ["right caudal pons", "left optic nerve"]
